import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import Navbar from "../Navbar"; import axios from 'axios'; import { Button, Modal, Form } from 'react-bootstrap'; function Dashboard() { const [data, setData] = useState([]); const urlserver = "http://localhost:4000"; //const urlserver = "https://backendrental.onrender.com"; useEffect(() => { return () => { fetchUsers(); } }, []); const fetchUsers = async () => { try { await axios.post(urlserver + `/api_payment/create`); const response = await axios.get(urlserver + `/api_payment`); setData(response.data); console.log(response.data); } catch (error) { console.error(error); } }; return ( <>
